## memoize1() function

Optimized memoization for single arg functions. If the function expects args other than strings or numbers, you MUST provide a `Map` implementation which supports value (rather than object) equality, e.g. one of those provided by . Using a native `Map` type here will lead to memory leaks! Alternatively, use .

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function memoize1<A, B>(fn: Fn1<A, B>, cache?: MapLike<A, B>): (x: A) => B;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fn | <code>Fn1&lt;A, B&gt;</code> |  |
|  cache | <code>MapLike&lt;A, B&gt;</code> |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

`(x: A) => B`
